item.description: We will view and discuss the first half of the 2009 documentary on Ray Kurzweil and his ideas, "Transcendent Man" (http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1117394/). In addition to Kurzweils explanation of his "law of accelerating returns" and its implications, the film includes opinions from both his supporters and his critics. Dennis Kababik will be leading the post-film discussion, which will center around the concept of the singularity and what this means to the future of evolution. Refreshments will be served.
item.how_to_find_us: We will probably be upstairs in the library, or in the social hall.
item.name: Conversations: Transcendent Man
